text: Archiargiolestes parvulus is a species of Australian damselfly in the family Megapodagrionidae, commonly known as a midget flatwing. It is endemic to south-western Australia, where it inhabits streams, bogs and swamps. Archiargiolestes parvulus is a small damselfly, black metallic in colour with pale markings. It rests with its wings outspread. ==Gallery== Archiargiolestes parvulus female wings (34787831906).jpg | Female wings Archiargiolestes parvulus male wings (34787835156).jpg | Male wings ==See also== * List of Odonata species of Australia == References == Category:Megapodagrionidae Category:Odonata of Australia Category:Insects of Australia Category:Endemic fauna of Australia Category:Taxa named by J.A.L. (Tony) Watson Category:Insects described in 1977 Category:Damselflies
title: Archiargiolestes parvulus
